Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.connections

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.connections 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater
    Thermostated heater component for the Household Energy Management project.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.connections used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater 
    Class and Description
    HeaterActuatorInboundPort
    The class HeaterActuatorInboundPort implements the inbound port for the HeaterActuatorCI component interface.
    HeaterActuatorOutboundPort
    The class HeaterActuatorOutboundPort implements the outbound port for the HeaterActuatorCI component interface.
    HeaterSensorDataInboundPort
    The class HeaterSensorDataInboundPort implements the inbound port for the HeaterSensorDataCI component data interface, and as such must implement the HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorOfferedPullCI pull interface as well as the method get from the DataOfferedCI.PullCI pull interface it extends to pull data from the server.
    HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort
    The class HeaterSensorDataOutboundPort implements the outbound port for the HeaterSensorDataCI component data interface, and as such must implement the HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI pull interface as well as the method receive from the DataRequiredCI.PushCI push interface to call the appropriate client component method to receive data pushed from the server component.
